title: Tamil script
summary: The Tamil script (தமிழ் அரிச்சுவடி, Tamiḻ ariccuvaṭi, [tamiɻ ˈaɾitːɕuʋaɽi], pronunciation ) is an abugida script that is used by Tamils and Tamil speakers in India, Sri Lanka, Malaysia, Singapore, Indonesia and elsewhere to write the Tamil language.[5] Certain minority languages such as Saurashtra, Badaga, Irula and Paniya are also written in the Tamil script.[6]
